attributes.action: Make the Chilcot Enquiry free to the public instead of costing £767
attributes.background: Taxpayers money funded the work of the Chilcot enquiry so why are we now being charged £767 for the findings?  It should be free.  The average wage in the UK is £26,500 which means that an average person would have to spend 43% of their monthly post-tax income to get access.  This is wrong.
